name: Green Bean Casserole 🥗
description: Whip up this classic Green Bean Casserole for a cozy, comforting side dish that'll have everyone asking for seconds. With its creamy mushroom sauce and crispy fried onions, it's a scrumptious addition to any meal.
instructions: To an 8-inch (20 cm) microwave-safe pie dish, add the green beans and cream of mushroom soup, then sprinkle the fried onions evenly over the top.
Microwave for 5 minutes at half power until onions have become a little crispy.
Top with scallions and serve warm.
